title: To The Stage: After A Year Away, Broadway Is Back
description: After a year away, Broadway's lights are back on. Some of the biggest productions have returned for vaccinated and masked audiences. From "Wicked" to "Chicago" to "Hamilton," theaters in New York are open at 100 percent capacity.
copyright: Copyright 2020-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: To The Stage: After A Year Away, Broadway Is Back
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Three Broadway veterans recorded audio diaries of their experiences as Broadway returns.
itunes:subtitle: Three Broadway veterans recorded audio diaries of their experiences as Broadway returns.
